duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain inventory and manage shipping and receiving tasks in a warehouse environment.
Operate forklifts and other warehouse equipment to move and organize items.
Drive and maintain larger vehicles, including cargo vans and box trucks.
Recognize and report potential repairs and maintenance needed on vehicles.
Assist in the setup and teardown of audiovisual equipment for events.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma/GED or vocational training in logistics/warehouse management.
